author: RTÉ News
title: At a glance: Latest developments around the globe
description: The latest Covid-19 developments around the globe
content:
More than 75,500 people have died around the world, nearly three-quarters of them in Europe, since the virus emerged in China in December, according to official sources.
The pandemic has killed more than 53,928 people in Europe, including 16,523 in Italy, 13… [+2492 chars]
